title: Linux bash Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the power of Linux bash commands with practical examples. Learn essential file system navigation, file and directory manipulation, and data searching and filtering techniques.

meta.title: Linux bash Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the power of Linux bash commands with practical examples. Learn essential file system navigation, file and directory manipulation, and data searching and filtering techniques.
meta.keywords: Linux, bash, commands, scripting, programming, file system, navigation, file management, data filtering

steps.title: Navigating the File System with Basic Linux Commands

verify.name: Verify current working directory
verify.hint: Ensure that the current working directory is /home/labex/project.

verify.name: Verify directory contents
verify.hint: Ensure that the current directory contains the files file1.txt, file2.txt, and the directories newdir and subdirectory.

steps.title: Manipulating Files and Directories using Linux Commands

verify.name: Verify file creation and copy
verify.hint: Ensure that the newfile.txt file is created in the current directory and the copyfile.txt file is created in the newdir directory.

verify.name: Verify file deletion
verify.hint: Ensure that the newfile.txt file is deleted from the current directory.

steps.title: Searching and Filtering Data with Linux Utilities

verify.name: Verify grep search
verify.hint: Ensure that the grep command can find the words "male" and "female" in the data.txt file.

verify.name: Verify awk data extraction
verify.hint: Ensure that the awk command can correctly extract the second field (age) from the data.txt file.
